onboarding.hello_title:
Hello breather,
Happy to have you!
onboarding.hello_subtitle:
Are you excited about the journey ahead? :)
Before you start, please read the safety and breathing instructions. It will make your experience more mindful and pleasant.
onboarding.hello_footnote: or read them later in your Profile
onboarding.title: Hello, I'm Dasha. Breathe with me.
onboarding.access_to_lib_lbl: to get access to more tracks and features
onboarding.go_practices_btn: Go to practices and register later

first_page.title: Deep meditation journey  through breathing  and electronic music

subtitle.first_part: By clicking a button you accept

second_page.title: Effects of 15 min breathwork are equal to 1 hour of mindfulness meditation

third_page.title: Our breathing practices are synced with electronic music and suit practitioners of all levels

complete_popup.title: YOU HAVE
complete_popup.main_lbl: We cannot breathe in the past or the future. We inhale and exhale always in the present.
complete_popup.subtitle: and
complete_popup.main_text:
get access to the library
of relaxing, energizing
and balancing practices
and track your progress.
complete_popup.lives_will_get_more: you will get 3 more lives next month
complete_popup.lives_restore_title: Do you want to restore missed day  and save your progress?
complete_popup.lives_restore_sub: You will have one less streak live

invite_complete_popup.subheader_progress: Your friend is now breathing  with BREATHE WITH ME

account.title: Account Settings
account.stat_info_pro: a month of free premium for every 3 friends

remove_popup.title: Delete account?
remove_popup.main_text: Your data, history  and progress in the application will be deleted. Deleted account cannot be returned.

sign_up.title: Create account
sign_up.info_streak: Create an account to see your progress
sign_up.subtitle: get access to all practices  and extended breathing statistics

reset_password.title: Forgot password
reset_password.header: We'll email you the instructions on how to restore your password

reminder_popup.title: Do you want a reminder?
reminder_popup.subtitle: It can help you make breathwork a habit and achieve sustainable positive changes sooner.

pro_popup.title: Upgrade  to Premium
pro_popup.subtitle: Get one free month  of Premium for every  3 registered friends
pro_popup.tip_1: Extended statistics of your breathing progress
pro_popup.tip_2: Ability to restore your practice  streak 3 times
pro_popup.footnote: *invite 3 friends every month  and be a permanent premium member
pro_popup.banner_subtitle:
Get a premium for a month for every 
3 friends who join the app

reminder.title: Reminder
reminder.placeholder_title: Save your progress inspires regular practice and ensures sustainable change
reminder.notification_description: Take a comfortable position and let's start

alerts.days_error: Please select at least one day

error.user_not_found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
error.weak_password: Password should be at least 6 characters
error.wrong_password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
error.requires_recent_login: Too long since most recent sign in. Sign in again before deleting your account.
